remarks: Non-colinear points are different.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Aug-2019.)  TODO (NM): maybe ~ ncolne2 could be simplified out and deleted, replaced by ~ ncolcom .
statement:
tglineelsb2.p $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglineelsb2.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglineelsb2.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
tglineelsb2.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
ncolne.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ncolne.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
ncolne.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
ncolne.2 $e |- ( ph -> -. ( X e. ( Y L Z ) \/ Y = Z ) ) $.
ncolne2 $p |- ( ph -> X =/= Z ) $.
